multiHqlReportIndex.hql: select projectid,platformid,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime, sum(day01retentionrate) day01retentionrate, sum(day03retentionrate) day03retentionrate, sum(day07retentionrate) day07retentionrate, sum(day15retentionrate) day15retentionrate, sum(day30retentionrate) day30retentionrate from video.t_mid_video_sdk_current_d where date > from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_sub(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp('{STARTTIME}', 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),30),'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd') and date < '{ENDTIME}' group by projectid,platformid,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime

select projectid,platformi platformid,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime, sum(newsubscriber) newsubscriber from ( select projectid,'1' platformi,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime, newsubscriber from video.t_mid_video_sdk_current_d where date > '{STARTTIME}' and date < '{ENDTIME}' and platformid='ALL' union all select projectid,'2' platformi,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime, newsubscriber from video.t_mid_video_sdk_current_d where date > '{STARTTIME}' and date < '{ENDTIME}' and platformid='ALL' union all select projectid,'99' platformi,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime, newsubscriber from video.t_mid_video_sdk_current_d where date > '{STARTTIME}' and date < '{ENDTIME}' and platformid='ALL' union all select projectid,'ALL' platformi,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime, newsubscriber from video.t_mid_video_sdk_current_d where date > '{STARTTIME}' and date < '{ENDTIME}' and platformid='ALL' )tt group by projectid,platformi,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime

select projectid, platformid, activitychannelid, activityid, dtime, sum(day01retentionrate)/30 avgday01retentionrate from ( select t1.projectid projectid, if(platformid is null,'ALL',platformid) platformid, if(t1.activitychannelid is null, 'ALL', t1.activitychannelid) activitychannelid, if(t1.activityid is null, 'ALL', t1.activityid) activityid, t2.dtime dtime, if(t1.day01retentionrate is null,0,t1.day01retentionrate) day01retentionrate from video.t_video_users_retention_d_hbase t1, (SELECT t.dtime FROM video.t_bdi_muchtv_video_rundate t WHERE t.dtime > '{STARTTIME}' AND t.dtime < '{ENDTIME}')t2 where t1.dtime < from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_sub(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(t2.dtime, 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),0),'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd') and t1.dtime > from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_sub(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(t2.dtime, 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),1+30),'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd') )tt group by projectid,platformid,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime

select projectid, platformid, activitychannelid, activityid, dtime, sum(day03retentionrate)/30 avgday03retentionrate from ( select t1.projectid projectid, if(platformid is null,'ALL',platformid) platformid, if(t1.activitychannelid is null, 'ALL', t1.activitychannelid) activitychannelid, if(t1.activityid is null, 'ALL', t1.activityid) activityid, t2.dtime dtime, if(t1.day03retentionrate is null,0,t1.day03retentionrate) day03retentionrate from video.t_video_users_retention_d_hbase t1, (SELECT t.dtime FROM video.t_bdi_muchtv_video_rundate t WHERE t.dtime > '{STARTTIME}' AND t.dtime < '{ENDTIME}')t2 where t1.dtime < from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_sub(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(t2.dtime, 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),2),'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd') and t1.dtime > from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_sub(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(t2.dtime, 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),3+30),'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd') )tt group by projectid,platformid,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime

select projectid, platformid, activitychannelid, activityid, dtime, sum(day07retentionrate)/30 avgday07retentionrate from ( select t1.projectid projectid, if(platformid is null,'ALL',platformid) platformid, if(t1.activitychannelid is null, 'ALL', t1.activitychannelid) activitychannelid, if(t1.activityid is null, 'ALL', t1.activityid) activityid, t2.dtime dtime, if(t1.day07retentionrate is null,0,t1.day07retentionrate) day07retentionrate from video.t_video_users_retention_d_hbase t1, (SELECT t.dtime FROM video.t_bdi_muchtv_video_rundate t WHERE t.dtime > '{STARTTIME}' AND t.dtime < '{ENDTIME}')t2 where t1.dtime < from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_sub(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(t2.dtime, 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),6),'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd') and t1.dtime > from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_sub(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(t2.dtime, 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),7+30),'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd') )tt group by projectid,platformid,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime

select projectid, platformid, activitychannelid, activityid, dtime, sum(day15retentionrate)/30 avgday15retentionrate from ( select t1.projectid projectid, if(platformid is null,'ALL',platformid) platformid, if(t1.activitychannelid is null, 'ALL', t1.activitychannelid) activitychannelid, if(t1.activityid is null, 'ALL', t1.activityid) activityid, t2.dtime dtime, if(t1.day15retentionrate is null,0,t1.day15retentionrate) day15retentionrate from video.t_video_users_retention_d_hbase t1, (SELECT t.dtime FROM video.t_bdi_muchtv_video_rundate t WHERE t.dtime > '{STARTTIME}' AND t.dtime < '{ENDTIME}')t2 where t1.dtime < from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_sub(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(t2.dtime, 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),14),'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd') and t1.dtime > from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_sub(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(t2.dtime, 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),15+30),'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd') )tt group by projectid,platformid,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime

select projectid, platformid, activitychannelid, activityid, dtime, sum(day30retentionrate)/30 avgday30retentionrate from ( select t1.projectid projectid, if(platformid is null,'ALL',platformid) platformid, if(t1.activitychannelid is null, 'ALL', t1.activitychannelid) activitychannelid, if(t1.activityid is null, 'ALL', t1.activityid) activityid, t2.dtime dtime, if(t1.day30retentionrate is null,0,t1.day30retentionrate) day30retentionrate from video.t_video_users_retention_d_hbase t1, (SELECT t.dtime FROM video.t_bdi_muchtv_video_rundate t WHERE t.dtime > '{STARTTIME}' AND t.dtime < '{ENDTIME}')t2 where t1.dtime < from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_sub(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(t2.dtime, 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),29),'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd') and t1.dtime > from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(date_sub(from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(t2.dtime, 'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyy-MM-dd'),30+30),'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd') )tt group by projectid,platformid,activitychannelid,activityid,dtime
